mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY.SUBCAT_NAME, CATEGORY.SUPERCAT_ID FROM PREFERENCES, CATEGORY WHERE PREFERENCES.SUBCAT_ID = CATEGORY.SUBCAT_ID AND USER_NO = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO PREFERENCES P USING DUAL ON(P.USER_NO = #{user_no} AND P.SUBCAT_ID = #{subcat_id}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.USER_NO, P.SUBCAT_ID) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{subcat_id})
